dmca.title: Let the Dragon Speak!
dmca.body:
Hi [Private],

I got this from the server people. I see the page is disabled so you 
might have heard this already. But if not here is the official cease
and desist order.

-[Private]

-------- Original Message --------
Subject: Re: Copyright Infringement
To: [Private]

Hello
We have received the below notice asking us to remove a page on your 
site due to Copyright Infringement. I visited the page they mentioned 
and I actually do not see anything that would be an infringement, it 
actually  looks like an endorsement for their product. However they are 
asking to  have it removed, so please remove the content and let us know 
when it is done.
Thanks
Support



Dear Sir or Madam:

I certify under penalty of perjury that I am an agent authorized to act on
behalf of Scansoft, Inc., the owner of certain valuable intellectual
property rights. Scansoft is the owner of all trademark, copyright and
other intellectual property rights for Software Products including, but not
limited to Dragon NaturallySpeaking, Omnipage and PDF Converter. Because of
these rights, no one is authorized to manufacture, distribute, copy, sell
and/or offer for sale products/services utilizing the Scansoft Properties
without the express written permission of Scansoft.

It has come to the attention of Scansoft that you are distributing
unlicensed and unauthorized Scansoft Products.

The property you are infringing is protected by the 1976 Copyright Act, 17
U.S.C.
